body_html: @colesbury Yes, it would overlap with the grid_sampler optimization I'm doing. However, it would also require porting the upsample/interpolate/resize kernels from THNN to ATen. That is orthogonal with my work. @ptrblck, if you want to, feel free to work on that first, and we can coordinate the later work afterwards. :)

body: @colesbury Yes, it would overlap with the grid_sampler optimization I'm doing. However, it would also require porting the upsample/interpolate/resize kernels from THNN to ATen. That is orthogonal with my work. @ptrblck, if you want to, feel free to work on that first, and we can coordinate the later work afterwards. :)
